item.title: Three people killed after shooting in Sweden
item.description: The incident took place at a hair salon in the town of Uppsala, Swedish media report.

item.title: Canada will deal with Trump 'on our terms', Carney tells BBC
item.description: Speaking exclusively to the BBC, Canada's PM says he will only visit the US when there is a "serious discussion to be had".

item.title: Man accused of Kim Kardashian Paris robbery 'regrets' $10m heist
item.description: The reality star was tied up and robbed at gunpoint at a luxury Paris hotel in 2016.

item.title: Gaza medic detained during deadly Israeli attack released, Red Crescent says
item.description: Assad al-Nassasra was missing for weeks following last month's attack, in which 15 emergency workers were killed by Israeli troops.

item.title: Pressure mounts to probe Kenya police and army after BBC expos√©
item.description: A BBC investigation identifies members of the security forces who shot dead protesters last June.
